description: Full-map VR rebuild in Unreal Engine that ports the Call of Duty Zombies cadence into room-scale combat with 300K+ community installs.

paragraphs: Unreal Engine blueprint systems drive real-time weapon IK, haptic feedback, and AI pathing that respects headset comfort limits.
I profiled the mod with GPU captures, baking occlusion volumes and streaming zones so the experience stays at 90 FPS on consumer rigs.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: COMMUNITY TELEMETRY FLAGGED MIGRAINE HOTSPOTS AND FORCED BETTER COMFORT TOGGLES.
